original_title: Milk Powder prices to drop next week
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Milk Powder importers have decided to reduce the price of imported milk powder products.
This decision was taken due to the drop in prices in the Global Market.
Accordingly, the price of a 1 Kg packet of imported milk powder will be reduced by Rs. 200/-.
The price of a 400 g packet of imported milk power will be reduced by Rs. 80/-.
CAA to raid shops violating consumer laws during festive season
